title: Saying No To Drake (Ft. Cipha Sounds)
itunes:author: Andrew Schulz's Flagrant with Akaash Singh
itunes:summary: Schulz sits down with legendary DJ, NY radio personality and stand up comedian Cipha Sounds. Cipha Sounds is the most influential A&R of the last 20 years and you would never know. He broke artists like Rihanna, Rick Ross, Sean Paul, the list goes on. He broke songs like Mobb Deep’s Quiet Storm. Cipha also started the first ever hip hop podcast. He actually started Alexx Media and Schulz’s relationship. Enjoy his story. INDULGE!
itunes:subtitle: Schulz sits down with legendary DJ, NY radio pers…
description: Schulz sits down with legendary DJ, NY radio personality and stand up comedian Cipha Sounds. Cipha Sounds is the most influential A&R of the last 20 years and you would never know. He broke artists like Rihanna, Rick Ross, Sean Paul, the list goes on. He broke songs like Mobb Deep’s Quiet Storm. Cipha also started the first ever hip hop podcast. He actually started Alexx Media and Schulz’s relationship. Enjoy his story. INDULGE!
